text: Colombiana is a 2011 French crime drama action movie set in Bogotá and Chicago. Zoe Saldana plays Cataleya, a hired killer whose parents are murdered when she is a child, so she seeks revenge. Cliff Curtis plays Emilio. This movie got mixed reviews from critics. It made almost $61 million. == Other websites == * Category:2010s action movies Category:2011 crime drama movies Category:Bogotá Category:2010s English-language movies Category:French action movies Category:French crime movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies about murderers Category:Movies about revenge Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Multilingual movies Category:Spanish-language movies
title: Colombiana
